attributes.action: Ensure that the appropriate governing body provide enough funding to enable a british epée fencing team to be entered into the 2012 olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have heard rumours from several sources that we will only be entering a british foil team into the olympics due to lack of funds....2012 is on home ground, we should not have to forfit a medal for the sake of expenses!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
